titleStmt.title: The true way of uniting the people of God in these nations· Opened in a sermon preached in the chappel at White-Hall, Jan. 1. 1659. By Peter Sterry.
titleStmt.author: Sterry, Peter, 1613-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Peter Cole, printer and book-seller, at the sign of the Printing-press in Cornhill neer the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The year in the title is given according to Lady Day dating.
Running title reads: A sermon preached in White-Hall Chappel, on the Lords Day in the after noon, Jan. 1. 1659.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
